title: POMEPS Conversations: Jillian Schwedler (S. 4, Ep. 6)
itunes:author: Marc Lynch
itunes:summary: Marc Lynch sat down with Jillian Schwedler to discuss economic development and the effects of the Arab Spring in Jordan. Schwedler, a professor of political science at Hunter College, is the author of "Policing and Prisons in the Middle East: Formations and Coercion" and "Faith in Moderation: Islamist parties in Jordan and Yemen."
itunes:subtitle: Marc Lynch sat down with Jillian Schwedler to disâ€¦
description: Marc Lynch sat down with Jillian Schwedler to discuss economic development and the effects of the Arab Spring in Jordan. Schwedler, a professor of political science at Hunter College, is the author of "Policing and Prisons in the Middle East: Formations and Coercion" and "Faith in Moderation: Islamist parties in Jordan and Yemen."
